announcements.title: Platform Maintenance Scheduled
announcements.content: We will be performing scheduled maintenance on our servers this weekend. The platform will be temporarily unavailable from 2:00 AM to 6:00 AM EST on Saturday, January 27th. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
announcements.author: Admin Team

announcements.title: New Feature Release
announcements.content: Exciting new features are now available in your dashboard! We've added enhanced coaching tools, improved match prediction algorithms, and a redesigned user interface. Check out the new features section to learn more.
announcements.author: Product Team

announcements.title: Community Guidelines Update
announcements.content: We have updated our community guidelines to ensure a better experience for all users. Please review the new guidelines in your account settings. Violations may result in account suspension or termination.
announcements.author: Community Team
